name: Candy Mania Jelly Blast-match 3 puzzle crush free game
name_original: Candy Mania Jelly Blast-match 3 puzzle crush free game
description:
Candy Mania Jelly Blast is a classic match 3 puzzle crush and amaziing game!
Match 3 or more same bubble candies to enjoy the pleasure fun soda elimination saga!
Exquisite graphics,colorful pop sugar candies,gorgeous special effect,lovely panda pet, and a varity of game items!
Interesting and wizard feature levels beyond you imagination!
Racing angry with other players in the world and to be an witch hero.
Slide you finger to shoot and enjoy the beautiful music and sound!
Candy Blast will be the best casual game that you ever played!
Download it now to enjoy the delicious farm cookie!
Features:
1.Classic gameplay
2.Various levels
3.Exquisite graphics
4.Five game items will make you easy to win
5.Beautiful music and sound
